Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis draft was written in March 2010 and was intended to be the beginning of a foundational paper on varieties of not necessarily rational languages and varieties of left compact semitopological semigroups, including
an Eilenberg variety theorem and a Reiterman's theorem. Lacking sufficient applications to develop the full theory, I put here what has been worked out\u00a7r
